features: 🧊[3-in-1 Portable Mini Fan] 2024 Newest Upgraded Portable fan with 180° Foldable is easy to use anywhere at any time.You can use the portable mini fan as a handheld fan,desk fan or neck fan.This portable mini fan allow you to adjust the fan head to your desired angle, making it suitable for both handheld and tabletop use. This portable fan foldable can be used for makeup, work, eating and sleeping, meanwhile it is the perfect companion for your summer travel, commuting and outdoor activities.

🧊[Enjoy 15H Max Cooling Time] The portable handheld fan for travel provides up to 15 hours of cooling on a single charge,allowing you to enjoy the fan all day long.You can charge portable handheld fan from any device with a USB port,and portable handheld fan comes with a charging cable for your convenience. Keep good charging habits, and the battery life will be longer.Plus,Our portable mini fan rechargeable is a stylish and valuable gift for anyone looking to stay cool in the summer.

🧊[Portable Lightweight & Easy to Clean HandHeld Fan] This small portable fan measures a mere 4 in tall and 3 in wide,Just 0.34LBS,so Lightweight for daily life,portable fan for travel is similar to most of today's smartphones.This mini handheld fan can be easily tossed in your carry-on, purse, beach bag, fanny pack,or backpack to add comfort to all kinds of hot-weather occasions. Easy to clean 2024 new design,you can easily open the lid of this product for cleaning.

🧊【2024 Upgraded Powerful Wind & Lower Noise】Mini portable fan is equipped with brushless copper motor, that is strong enough to keep the fan blades running at high speed stably to generate powerful wind continuously.The upgraded fluid dynamics design blades also make the air volume more focused and stronger, you can feel the airflow even 5.9Ft away from the eyelash fan, helping you cool down in seconds with our handheld fan.

🎁【Summer Gift Choice & Perfect After-Sale Service】: Our portable fan is running at high speed stably can give you a cold cool.In the hot summer,you can send small fan as a gift for your family and friends to keep them cool in the summer.It will be a prefect summer gift.For your peace of mind, this portable heater comes with a 1-year hassle-free exchange guarantee. If there is any quality problem after purchase, you can contact our customer service team at any time.
body.description: 😀As the summer heat ramps up, it becomes increasingly important to keep cool. Mini portable fans offer the perfect solution by allowing you to create a breeze wherever you go.Our small handheld fan have the following advantages 🧊Portability: The fan is light in weight, small in size, and the folding design is easy to carry and use.It can be handheld or folded into a desktop fan. 🧊4 wind speeds: 4 wind power adjustments, allowing you to spend the hot summer easily. 🧊Durability: Made of high-quality materials, this mini handheld fan is durable and has a long battery life that ensures hours of continuous operation. 🧊Quiet: The sound of the fan is very small when in use, suitable for work or study, the quiet operation of the fan can keep you focused and cool for a long time in the office or workplace. 📦Package:; 1 * Fan 1 * USB Cable 1 * Lanyard 1 * Manual ✔Whether you are looking for a way to beat the heat during your outdoor activities, or struggling to stay focused and comfortable in the workplace, a handheld fan can provide the perfect solution to staying cool and refreshed. 💖If you have any problem when you use,please contact us any time,We will respond to you within 24 hours.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This product was great! I love he different speeds and that it is rechargeable. It is very lightweight and comes with a cord to hang around your neck. I like that it can be put in a few different positions as well! Kept me cool during the heat at Disney World!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A great little fan!
reviews.reviewText: This was a great find! It's lightweight and I love the fact that it's compactable. It's also nice that it can be charged or battery powered, and I love all the speeds. A great mini fan for a great price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars very nice and portable
reviews.reviewText: this product is foldable so it’s super convenient to put into my disc golf bag and i was super surprised by how powerful it is for the price and size

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These fans are great! They saved my daughter and her friends from an intense late season heatwave while in an unairconditioned school all day. Kids started calling her the fan queen cause she literally cooled her whole class after I bought 6 of them (they passed them around and shared since there are 19 kids in her class). The battery life is amazing. They lasted all day at school and likely could have gone on much longer. They have 3 settings, so if you just like a little breeze you could have that on the 1st setting and if you're really hot, the 3rd setting will easily keep you cool. The price is also super affordable. I don't often write reviews, but these seriously were saviors during our heatwave. Essential for on the go cooling!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great fan. Lightweight and powerful
reviews.reviewText: i purchased to keep my 96 yo mom-in-law cool during an outdoor party on a very hot summer day. She loved this fan!! She held it in her hand for an hour just enjoying the breeze. I also love it to keep me cool during my hot-flashes. It is very powerful and I really like how small and light weight it is. And it fits into my tiny purse. I purchased 2 and plan to buy more.The only con is the placement of the button. Being on the outside when folded, it turns on while while in my purse or gets pressed when sitting on a desk.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: For a small fan, I’m blown away at how well this works! Good to use in dressing rooms!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars PERFECT FOR THEME PARKS!!!!
reviews.reviewText: To start off it’s the cutest, most compact fan ever!! It fits perfectly in my park bag and doesn’t take up ANY room! It is also EXTREMELY strong in comparison to other portable fans I’ve used!! As a Floridian, this little pink powerhouse is definitely going to come in handy on sunny park days!!! Couldn’t be happier!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This fan does exactly what its supposed to. It has four different speeds, and its compact enough to fit it in your bag or purse. I bought it because I needed something to dry my makeup, and also use when its very hot outside! Definitely worth the purchase and I would highly reccommend it!
